name: frozen though they are, those people long past cause havoc in my brain
name_original: frozen though they are, those people long past cause havoc in my brain
description:
a short experience based on a reoccurring dream.

made for Black and White Jam #8

controls

LMB - throw torch

RMB - lob torch

WASD - move

Spacebar - jump

Control - crouch

Shift - sprint

Escape - exit
